title: Reduce Upload Artwork button size

requirements.text: Reduce both the visual size (width and height) and clickable area of the Upload Artwork button/input control on the main upload page (UploadView). The button should be noticeably smaller than its current dimensions while remaining clearly visible and accessible.

quotes: Reduce the size of the upload option

acceptanceCriteria: The Upload Artwork button/input on the main upload page has reduced width and height compared to the current implementation
The clickable/interactive area of the upload control is proportionally reduced
The upload control remains clearly visible and usable after the size reduction
The size reduction applies only to the main upload page, not to any other upload controls that may exist elsewhere

constraints: Only modify the upload control on the main upload page (UploadView)
Do not change backend logic or data structures
Maintain accessibility and usability of the upload control
nonGoals: Changing the size of upload controls on other pages or dialogs
Modifying the upload functionality or file handling logic
Changing the overall layout or positioning of the upload page
